flag provided but not defined: -merge-strategy
Usage of init:
  -agents string
    	Comma-separated list of agents to include (claude,gemini,codex,aider,goose,opencode) or 'all'
  -apt-get-install string
    	Additional packages to install via apt-get (comma-separated)
  -copy-home-paths string
    	Comma-separated paths relative to $HOME to copy into container home
  -exclude-agents string
    	Comma-separated list of agents to exclude
  -npm-install string
    	Additional packages to install via npm (comma-separated)
  -previous-init-flags string
    	How to handle existing init config: 'reuse' or 'ignore'
  -project-directory string
    	Project directory to initialize (default ".")
  -ssl string
    	SSL mode: 'no' (default) or 'selfsign' for self-signed certificates (default "no")
  -with-docker
    	Mount Docker socket to allow container to run Docker commands on host
  -with-slash-commands string
    	Git repos to clone as slash commands (space-separated, format: [alias@]<git-url>)
